text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡيَجِدُواْ فِيكُمۡ غِلۡظَةٗۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

translation.en: O you who have believed, fight those adjacent to you of the disbelievers and let them find in you harshness. And know that Allah is with the righteous
translation.id: Wahai orang-orang beriman! Perangilah orang-orang kafir yang di sekitar kamu, dan hendaklah mereka merasakan sikap tegas darimu, dan ketahuilah bahwa Allah bersama orang yang bertakwa
